nCfOKTUfMXv2K-qgq.text: Ogres are large, immensely strong humanoids. They stand between 7 and 8 feet tall, and are much more muscular than the human norm. Their features are coarse and vacant. Their bodies are very hairy, but the hair on their heads is either scant or missing. Their teeth are irregular and sharp, their complexions are pasty and blotched, and it is quite common for one eye to be strangely bloated. Their posture leans forward, and their arms are very long, in a manner suggestive of a giant, hairless ape.

nivYFbcbADyH0p-oA.text: The GM should figure an Ogre’s height based on his ST without the Enhanced ST advantage, then increase it by 60%. Average weight is 5 times that of a human of the same ST (without the Enhanced ST). Half-Ogres have normal height for their ST, but twice normal weight.

npsNZG92wSu-o3Smm.text: Ogres usually wear some clothing – typically rags or rancid furs. They love armor, but have trouble finding any that fits.
